title: Easy vegan tofu chilli
ingredients: ['1 (349g) carton Blue Dragon Tofu Firm Silken Style', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 medium onion, chopped', '2 stalks celery, chopped', '100g (4 oz) tinned or frozen sweetcorn', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1L (1 pint 15 fl oz) water', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
